com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanKey

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<TitanElement>, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element, com.thinkaurelius.titan.util.datastructures.Removable, TitanElement, TitanType, TitanVertex, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex

    public interface TitanKey
extends TitanType
    TitanKey is an extension of TitanType for properties.

    In addition to TitanType, TitanKey defines:

    • Data Type: The accepted types of attribute values.
    • Index: Whether attribute values are indexed. If a property key is configured to be indexed, then all properties with that key are indexed which means one can retrieve vertices for that key and a value via TitanTransaction.query(). The type of index can be configured individually for each key and each element type. For instance, one can define only vertices to be indexed for a particular key.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (me@matthiasb.com)
    See Also:
    TitanType
